name: Odysseus Kosmos and his Robot Quest: Episode 1
description: What do you do if you are the only one left aboard a spaceship? Your team has embarked on a mysterious expedition a few years ago, the ship’s machinery has started acting up and it seems there are ghosts wandering about. Luckily, the black hole above you doesn’t pose any problems…yet.
minimum_requirements: Betriebssystem: Windows 7 Arbeitsspeicher: 2 GB RAM Speicherplatz: 200 MB verfügbarer Speicherplatz
